item.title: Imposter Syndrome? You're doing better than you think.
item.description: Sharing a few notes about Imposter Syndrome based on the work of Dr. Vanessa Bohns and Dr. Randy Patterson. The Science of Influence I finished watching this interview with Dr. Vanessa Bohns. Here’s what I learned: When we focus too much on our insecurities, we hyper-focus on our inadequacies. The only person in the room focusing on our inadequacies is… ourselves. We all have an “invisible audience” that we influence without realizing it.
